insert into @{openQuote}object@{closeQuote} (id, type, formId, name, title, description, tooltip, action, actionTarget, objectId, sequence) select 2, 'MENU_ITEM', 1, '@{menuItemName}', '#{ui}', '', '', '@{menuItemUrl}', '', 1, 1 where not exists (select 1 from @{openQuote}object@{closeQuote} where id = 2);
insert into @{openQuote}groupObject}@{closeQuote} (objectId, groupId) select 2, 1 where not exists (select 1 from @{openQuote}groupObject@{closeQuote} where objectId = 2 and groupId = 1);
